H0.text: Luster is the breaking of a mineral into small, flat sheets.

H1.text: Streak is the breaking of a mineral into small, flat sheets.

H2.text: Cleavage is the breaking of a mineral into small, flat sheets.

H3.text: Hardness is the breaking of a mineral into small, flat sheets.

A4.text: Cleavage is the tendency of crystalline materials to split along definite crystallographic structural planes.
